Quest1: ^Oh hello! That is a new face.
^You know what! I may need some help. I need an ingredient for a healing potion.
^I may go myself but I can not leave right now.
^Can you help me? Of course you will not leave empty handed.
^No,I do not have time for that.

c-0: ^I need 3 red flowers. Come back again when you have them!
c-1: ^If you change your mind, please come back.
